typeDescription.name: Answer
typeDescription.description: This object contains annotation for the answers. It will contains the floowing fields: begin (int): where the annotation begins end (int): where the annotation ends IsCorrect (boolean): if the answer is correct ComponentID (string): The name of the component which produced this annotation object Confidence (float): Confidence value assigned by the component which produced this object

featureDescription.name: IsCorrect
featureDescription.description: Stores boolean for: Is this answer correct?

featureDescription.name: ComponentID
featureDescription.description: Contains the name of the component which created this annotation.

featureDescription.name: Confidence
featureDescription.description: Contains a float value between 0 and 1 which describes the confidence of the component.
